product_name: Wakefit Memory Foam Solid Sleeping Pillow
description: Material: Polyester, Filling Material: Memory Foam, Size: 53.37 cm x 38.35 cm, Color: Light Grey, Ideal For: Bedroom, Features: A memory foam sleeping pillow that molds to the shape of your head and neck for personalized support and alignment, reduces discomfort, making it an excellent choice for those with neck pain or other sleep-related issues.
